name: Tribes and Nations New web site
description:
We now have a new home at www.tribesandnations.com.au
Please come and visit us there to make purposeful purchases through our full fair trade range.
We still stock handbags, baskets, jewellery, keyrings, coffee, tea and chocolate.
Thanks for sharing in fair trade with us!
The Team
Tribes and Nations

name: Ethiopian Harrar Fairtrade Organic Coffee  250g
description:
A rich, organic, Fairtrade Arabica from the fairly paid farmers of the Harrar region, Ethiopia.
Our Ethiopian Harrar Fairtrade coffee is rated as one of our stronger coffees with the slight acidity that many coffee lovers look for. In the mild roast it performs well for large groups, not being too strong for those of more delicate pallets while having a nutty flavour for the connoisseurs.

NB Paying by cheque or EFT? (Electronic Funds Transfer) Once you finish your order and are in the shopping cart section please print screen (hold the control button (Ctrl) and hit the ‘PrtScn’ button, top right of your keyboard) then copy this into an e-mail (open the e-mail, start typing then copy (hold ‘Ctrl’ and hit ‘C’) the ‘screen shot’ that you have just made will appear) to sales@tribesandnations.com.au    We will completed the order once the cheque has arrived or the funds have cleared in our account. 
This is a temporary measure while we build our new web site. Our apologies for any inconvenience caused. 
An alternative shopping method for coffee, tea or chocolate is to take a copy of our Fast Order Form from here http://www.tribesandnations.com.au/resources/

name: Niulife Coconut Oil Body Bar x 5
description:
Niulife Coconut Oil Body Bar, 100 grams.
From top left: Frangipani, Lemongrass.
Bottom left: Lavender, Mango, Oatmeal.

The Oatmeal, great for those sensitive skin, is without any essential or fragrance oil. 
The richness of the coconut oil mixed with the other oils gives an enriching body soap that does not dry out the skin. As a family with sensitive skins it has helped us tremendously! It lathers up beautifully and the fragrance is refreshing.
Made by Kokonut Pacific. Kokonut Pacific is a foundation member of the Fair Trade Association of Australia and New Zealand (FTAANZ) which is closely linked with the international FT organisation FLO.
